text: Your first memory is warmth. You’re curled beneath your mother's wing. Her horns were...

choices.text: Graceful and curved like ancient trees.
Jagged and fearsome, like obsidian blades.

text: You hear your father’s roar echo through the mountains. His scales shimmered like...

You remember the comfort of your family's den, the scent of stone and smoke. Then, a shadow blots out the sky. 
A monstrous figure crashes down. Your mother stands, her {{mother_horns}} horns ready. Your father’s {{father_scales}} scales flash as he roars.
Brutefang has come...

Flames and fury fill your vision. The clash of titans leaves your den in ruins. 
Your mother’s {{mother_horns}} horns are shattered. Your father’s {{father_scales}} scales are dulled and bloodied. 
When the smoke clears, you are alone.

You are a hatchling no longer protected. But within you, remnants of your parents remain — {{player_horns}} horns, {{player_scales}} scales. 
You must survive, grow, and one day face Brutefang.
